Title: Nearshop.online
description: Multi-vendor eCommerce app connecting shops and customers with billing management.
story: A platform for shops to connect with customers, featuring billing management and multi-shop ownership. Integrated Google Maps for location-based services.
fechers: Global product concept to reduce duplicate entries

Title: University Manager
description: Project for Juniar College coordination at Jamia Nooriyya.
story: A project to computerize the coordination of 60+ junior colleges, 5300+ students, and 3 courses at Jamia Nooriyya. Planned to implement a barcode system for exams.
fechers: Admin management of colleges, students, exams, entrance, and results
Planning to implement a barcode system for exams

Title: Modapps.in
description: App store and blog website built as a freelance project.
story: A platform that allows admin to manage apps and blog posts, with integrated Google Analytics for traffic analysis. Enhanced user experience with NextUI and Framer motion.
fechers: Admin management of apps and blogs
NextUI and Framer motion for enhanced user experience
Jodit text editor for blog writing

Title: Hotler
description: Website for cafes, messes, hotels, and restaurants with QR ordering.
story: A project aimed at implementing a QR ordering system for customers without authentication, targeting cafes, messes, hotels, and restaurants.
fechers: QR ordering system without customer authentication

Title: Metrix Game
description: 1024 game with custom algorithm for calculation and alignment.
story: Developed the 1024 game with a custom algorithm for metrix calculation and alignment. Used NPM modules for swipe tracking and music playback.

Title: OLX - Redesign
description: Redesign of the OLX website with a modern look.
story: A project to redesign the OLX website, focusing on modernizing the user interface and integrating Firebase for authentication and data storage.
fechers: Firebase for authentication and data storage
